text: Lawrence Joseph Hogan (September 30, 1928 - April 20, 2017) was an American Republican U.S. Representative. He was the father of the former Governor of Maryland, Larry Hogan. Hogan represented the 5th congressional district of Maryland from January 3, 1969, to January 3, 1975. Hogan did not run for re- election in 1974 and was unsuccessful that year in his candidacy for the Republican nomination for governor. He became county executive for Prince George's County, Maryland, in 1978 and served until 1982. Hogan suffered a stroke and died on April 20, 2017 in Baltimore, Maryland, aged 88. ==References== ==Other websites== *Hogan's Maryland Archives biography *Larry Hogan Sr. Speaks about his decision on the Nixon Impeachment Vimeo Category:1928 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Politicians from Boston Category:United States representatives from Maryland Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Lawrence Hogan
